relevant_communication: to help companies (associates) to comply with EU legislation in the due time as well as represent to the EU institutions the Association positions on food labelling, nutrition, diet, food safety and supply chain. To organise events, to draw the attention of the EU institutions on the food supply chain regarding the 24 sectors represented by AIIPA (coffee, baby foods, canned vegetables fresh cut produts, frozen products, honey, food supplements, etc.)
